page.title: 01DUNS, BERWICKSHIRE
page.content: DUNS IS A SMALL TOWN IN THE BORDERS REGION OF SCOTLAND.IT IS THE COUNTY TOWN OF BERWICKSHIRE & THE BIGGEST TOWN. THE POPULATION IS{3000.} THE COUNTRYSIDE AROUND DUNS, KNOWN AS "THE MERSE", IS AGRICULTURAL, THE MAIN TYPES OF FARMING BEING ARABLE & FORESTRY. DUNS IS SURROUNDED BY VILLAGES WHICH USE THE SERVICES OF THE TOWN, SUCH AS SHOPS, THE HOSPITAL, THE EMERGENCY SERVICES & THE SPORTS COMPLEX. THE TOWN HAS A MIXTURE OF COUNCIL & PRIVATE HOUSING. THERE IS LITTLE PUBLIC TRANSPORT, BUT CHILDREN ARE BROUGHT TO SCHOOL, ESPECIALLY THE HIGH SCHOOL, BY BUS. THE TOWN IS A CARING COMMUNITY, MAKING PROVISION FOR THE OLD & HANDICAPPED.
